SELECT m1.memberIdx, m1.userId, userName, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, tel, membership, enabled, email FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId
AND enabled = #{enabled}
AND m1.membership < 50
ORDER BY register_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT membership, m1.memberIdx, m1.userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, membership, register_date, modify_date, last_login, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2 FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId WHERE m1.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
